content.prompt: Ms. Kawamura says it is hard to get to her school because

choices.label: she has to climb up a hill and a long stairway
she has to walk across a big field
the school is located in a congested area
the school is far away from her home

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
